results.name: hallucinations
results.label: HALLUCINATION
results.reason: HALLUCINATION: The response generates specific financial figures, technical indicators, and news summaries that are not provided or implied in the prompt. These specific details are fabricated and presented as facts.

results.name: instructionsFollowing
results.label: FOLLOWS_INSTRUCTIONS
results.reason: The AI successfully generated a comprehensive equity report for the specified company, covering all expected aspects of such a report without adding irrelevant information or missing any instructions.
